@graph.name: OSHA Kits for Small Contracting Teams

itemListElement.name: Contractor First Aid Kit by Medique
itemListElement.description: A rugged, portable OSHA-compliant kit designed for small crews up to 25 workers.

itemListElement.name: North by Honeywell First Aid Kit
itemListElement.description: Compact, OSHA-compliant first aid kit with industrial-grade supplies.

itemListElement.name: MFASCO Construction First Aid Kit
itemListElement.description: All-in-one jobsite kit packed for fast treatment of cuts, burns, and injuries.

itemListElement.name: First Aid Only Contractor Kit (FAO-442)
itemListElement.description: OSHA-compliant kit designed for up to 25 employees, ideal for job trailers and trucks.

itemListElement.name: Surviveware Small First Aid Kit
itemListElement.description: Compact, water-resistant kit with labeled compartments and essentials for small teams.

mainEntity.name: Do these kits meet OSHA standards for small construction crews?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes — all featured kits meet or exceed OSHA and ANSI first aid requirements for worksites with up to 25 employees.

mainEntity.name: What’s the best kit for a 5–10 person contracting team?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Medique and Honeywell kits are both ideal for 5–10 person teams, offering compliant, compact safety with room to scale.

mainEntity.name: Can I mount these kits in my truck or trailer?

acceptedAnswer.text: Most of these kits include wall-mount brackets or portable cases, making them ideal for vehicles, trailers, or site boxes.
